reviews:
only turning size is small that expected
but material quality is good order one size bigger if you are tall i bought three shorts and it turned out to be so comfy girls can use it as daily wear
go for it  it was too small wont fit women with broad hips can buy more awesome product great shorts good material comfortable fit i had brought 3 tho shorts out of which 2 shorts was of my size and one i was getting a little bigger ive been using these shorts for a few weeks now and i love them the material is soft and of good quality and they are a perfect fit which makes them comfortable the colours are nice too as is the print

note the packet suggests you wash the shorts separately the first time to make sure any extra dye is removed please do that while no colour came off the lighter colour shorts a little of the extra dye came off of the dark blue one since this is normal and was clearly mentioned in the packet i wont take any stars off for it

also thanks to the seller for the card and the two eclairs i loved that just as well as the product itself a thumbsup for this personal touchüëçüòä

edit july 4 2022
after a year and a halfs regular rough usage the shorts are still as good as new the colour hasnt faded and the elastic is good it neither looks nor feels old

reviews: fits as expected good quality little bit pricey they are just amazing a little bit more expensive for my liking but the fit and quality lives upto it the shorts are fine although it mentions 92 cotton but it does not feel much like cotton feels more like spandex the side bottom protrudes like a nose and hence the shape is a little wierd its comfortable but looks just ok after wearing like quality wise product is really nice but the issue is with the size i have ordered m as it fits me but m for this product is quite large and it is little bit large\n\nbut rather than this you can go for this it is nice product color is also fine i expected these to be of thicker less stretchy fabric since theyre like board shorts the fabric is soft good quality and not flimsy but its very stretchy the kind that clings so panty lines bulges and contours definitely show the waistband is very wide and of good quality but i think these shorts are overpriced for what they are they arent supportive and smoothing like tights of this material would be but they arent relaxed fit like shorts not sure what they were going for yoga pants only shorts and looser too good fits perfectly value for money the cloth is really nice its 92 cotton the pockets have chain which help your stuff to be intact it fits perfectly its about knee length as shown in picture its just that the colour is a little dull as its jet black i have kept it still as its worth having got it for ‚Çπ649
